roleset.name: notable, worthy of remarking on

example.name: empty it, arg1
example.text: It 's remarkable how little discussion there is about this .
example.arg: how little discussion there is about this

roleset.name: indicating a particular condition or outcome

example.name: both args
example.text: Lower extremities are remarkable for 2 to 3 + edema .
